hero.title: Experience the Authentic Taste of Italy at PizzaExpress Koramangala
hero.subtitle: Indulge in our gourmet hand-tossed pizzas, exquisite cheesecakes, and premium Italian coffee, perfected since 1965.

about.title: Our Story: The Heart of PizzaExpress Koramangala
about.paragraph1: At PizzaExpress, we've been masters of authentic Italian flavors since 1965. Here in Koramangala, we continue that cherished legacy, serving up our signature hand-tossed gourmet pizzas, each a testament to tradition and culinary passion.
about.paragraph2: But the PizzaExpress experience extends beyond pizza. Delight in our mouth-melting in-house baked cheesecake and savor the rich aroma of our fresh Italian coffee. We invite you to enjoy our vibrant pizzeria and cafe, where every dish is crafted with care and served with style.
